metadata.ns:textReviewContext: Someone interacts with a cloud application
metadata.ns:textReviewSolution: Follow the principle of least privilege; Apply Authorization; Apply Audit; Apply Mandatory Access Control (MAC); Apply Discretionary Access Control (DAC); Apply Role-Based Access Control (RBAC); Apply management of user sessions; Secure user IDs and tokens; Ensure proper file permissions; Avoid Path Traversal;
metadata.ns:textReviewProblem: No access control, broken (weak) access control, and the authorization issues of the cloud application
